title: When Does A Pandemic Start To Erode Civil Liberties?
description: Mask mandates have become a polarizing issue across the country, from Arizona to Georgia. So, where do we draw the line between public health and civil liberties? Also, we talk about air -- how can buildings ensure it's safe to breathe during the pandemic? And finally, some good vaccine news.
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, Anna Rothschild
itunes:subtitle: Mask mandates have become a polarizing issue across the country, from Arizona to Georgia. So, where do we draw the line between public health and civil liberties?
